metadata.title: WUAI Men's Swim Trunks Loose Fit Fashion Outdoor Lightweight Quick Dry Shorts
features: To Make Sure the Size You Choose Fits As expected. You can choose 1 or 2 Size UP, since the Asize size may much smaller than US size.

Hidden Hook and loop closure.Comfort Fit Side Elastic Men's Hiking Shorts. Travel friendly Quick Dry fabric. 2 front slash pockets, plus 2 zip-close security pockets. High-performance wicking fabric, hight quality fabric for outdoor sports.

High Air Permeability: highly breathable material helps draw sweat away from skin and allow you to stay cool throughout your ride or climbing. Comfortability: with loose yet fit design, mesh lining, elastic waistband and fastener tape on band, these waterproof shorts are also extremely comfortable.

Classic side and back pockets, plus a zippered cargo pocket, give you options to carry valuables with you. UPF 50 sun protection blocks UVA and UVB rays.Notice: Belt not included. Function: Multi-pockets, including side hand-pockets, plus rear and leg cargo pockets with snaps, stylish and functional, perfect for everyday wear or even work attire if shorts are an option.

1.About the Order: All your promblems will be solved within 24 hours solved.  2.Please allow 1-2cm measuring deviation due to manual measurement.  3.About the Shipping Methods: we have two delivery methods: EUB delivery or DHL delivery(expensive cost). Shipping cost is different , before you order, please take into consideration carefully. Thanks!  Eub delivery: usually it takes 15-25 days to arrive you.  DHL delivery : usually it takes One Week to arrive you.
